Description:
AFFORDABILITY IN AN OUTSTANDING LOCATION!
CRANBOURNE EAST - Located in the Cascades on Clyde estate sits this exceptional downsizer or first home opportunity!
The property itself offers a functional floor plan consisting of 3 robed bedrooms, the large master providing a full en-suite and walk in robe.
